home about work

Hi there, I'm Eshaan

I'm a recent Bachelor of IT grad at the University of Technology Sydney. Over the past three years I've been fortunate to engage in various projects, teams and work. During the time I discovered my passion for developing solutions. Whether architecting, designing or developing, I've enjoyed the process of making ideas a reality and seeing the impact often wild ideas can have upon people.

Currently I'm a Tech Advisory graduate at KPMG, in which I'm able to share my own knowledge and experience and also grow immensley in both facets.

In my spare time I enjoy reading, going to the gym or simply having a chat with my mates. Since I'm fortunate to live in Sydney, I'm also lucky to indulge in the plethora of beaches Sydney brags.

My values

How can you solve one's problem if you don't understand it at the root? Empathy is a key value used to uncover the 'why', 'what' and 'how' before jumping into developing a solution.

Keep on learning. An aspect to this is retaining humility, no matter what position you find yourself in, remain a student and look to challenge and improve yourself.

Channelling your energy into something you deeply care for will get you far. The more you care the more your willing to do, sacrafice and risk. Surrounding yourself with similar people will get you even further.
